ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (RecordType.DeveloperName = "Incident") && NOT(ISNEW()) && $Profile.Name != "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name != "IBL Support L1" && $Profile.Name != "IBL Support L2" && $Profile.Name != "IBL Support L2 V2"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please contact your System Administrator or the Support Team to edit any value.
